name: Cannon Bowls (SA Game Jam 2018)
description:
Bowling 🎳 with a cannon and waves of zombie bowling pins.

                   🌡🌡🌡🌡
💣              🌡🌡🌡
                💥🌡🌡
                         🌡

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to rotate and tilt (if Tilt Mod applied).
  • SPACE to shoot (hold down to increase power if Power Control Mod applied).
  • Mouse to click buttons ;)

BUG: Mods are only applied after first shot of new wave.

NB: Menu only works at 4:3 resolution (sorry). This is because I was going to make a web build, but couldn't get it to work.
